comment.author: 42400804@N05
comment._content: Pr'ss seems extraordinarily beautiful with a strong character I found this information about her: On 17 September 1924 she married Prince Wolfgang of Hesse (1896–1989), the heir of the would-be King of Finland. another pic of her: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:PrincessMarieAlexandra.jpg Princess Marie Alexandra was killed during an air-raid on Frankfurt am Main in World War II.
